statements: SELECT * FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT behavior_description FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visitor_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM visitors_tracking ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visitor_name LIKE '%John%' AND behavior_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visitor_id = 1;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitors_tracking WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_description FROM visitors_tracking WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%positive%' OR behavior_description LIKE '%negative%';
SELECT DISTINCT visitor_name FROM visitors_tracking ORDER BY visitor_name ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM visitors_tracking GROUP BY visitor_name HAVING total_visits > 3;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM Visitors ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, number_of_visits FROM Visitors WHERE number_of_visits > 5;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_type FROM Visitors JOIN Behaviors ON Visitors.visitor_id = Behaviors.visitor_id;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_description FROM Visitors JOIN Behaviors ON Visitors.visitor_id = Behaviors.visitor_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Click';
SELECT * FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM Visitors ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM Visitors JOIN Behaviors ON Visitors.visitor_id = Behaviors.visitor_id WHERE number_of_visits > 5;
SELECT visitor_name, COUNT(behavior_id) AS total_behaviors FROM Visitors LEFT JOIN Behaviors ON Visitors.visitor_id = Behaviors.visitor_id GROUP BY visitor_id;
SELECT visitor_name, MAX(number_of_visits) AS max_visits FROM Visitors;
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM Visitors WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, site_location, rating FROM TourismSites WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT visitor_name, site_name, visit_date FROM Visitors JOIN Visits ON Visitors.visitor_id = Visits.visitor_id JOIN TourismSites ON Visits.site_id = TourismSites.site_id;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_description FROM Visitors WHERE behavior_description IS NOT NULL OR behavior_description <> '';
SELECT * FROM Visitors;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visit_date FROM Visitors WHERE visit_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, capacity, rating FROM TourismSites WHERE capacity > 100 AND rating >= 4.5;
SELECT v.visit_id, v.visit_date, vs.site_name, vs.site_location FROM Visits v JOIN TourismSites vs ON v.site_id = vs.site_id;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior_description FROM Visitors WHERE visitor_name LIKE '%John%' OR behavior_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY visitor_name ASC, visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitors ORDER BY visit_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT first_name, last_name, country FROM visitors WHERE country='USA'
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behavior WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, visit_date FROM visitors WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY visit_date ASC
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description, behavior_date FROM behavior WHERE visitor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM visitors WHERE country='USA';
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name FROM visitors ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(behavior_id) AS behavior_count FROM behavior GROUP BY behavior_type HAVING behavior_count > 2;
SELECT visitor_id, first_name, last_name, behavior_description FROM visitors JOIN behavior ON visitors.visitor_id = behavior.visitor_id;
SELECT impact_type, impact_description, resource_name FROM tourism_impact JOIN natural_resources ON tourism_impact.impact_id = natural_resources.resource_id WHERE impact_type='Positive';
SELECT * FROM visitors;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name FROM visitors WHERE visit_date='2022-12-01';
SELECT visitor_name, behavior FROM visitors ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, behavior FROM visitors WHERE behavior LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT v.visitor_name, b.booking_date FROM visitors v INNER JOIN bookings b ON v.visitor_id = b.visitor_id WHERE b.booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM visitors;
SELECT visitor_name, visit_date FROM visitors WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visitor_name DESC;
SELECT r.resource_name, i.impact_description, v.visitor_name FROM resources r JOIN impact i ON r.resource_id = i.resource_id JOIN visitors v ON i.visitor_id = v.visitor_id;
SELECT t.tour_name, b.booking_date FROM tours t JOIN bookings b ON t.tour_id = b.tour_id ORDER BY b.booking_date ASC;
SELECT visitor_name, behavior FROM visitors WHERE behavior LIKE '%positive%' AND visitor_name != 'John Doe';
